title: Love River Star, Aito

fields.name: -Attack a player. You may choose to do any of the following to the attacked player, but you may choose no more than 1 additional effect:
fields.value:
> Clean them.
> Disguise their cause of death to be any other role.
> Make them appear to be alive for a day. They will appear as dead the day after.
- Attack a player. You may choose to do any of the following to the attacked player, but you may choose no more than 1 additional effect:
> Redirect all of their visitors (excluding you) into a target of your choice.
> Invalidate protective abilities used on them for the night.
> Lower their defense value to None. Protective abilities can still raise the value

desc:
Post 1573D
*All my friends hope give me strength!*

Abilities
-Attack a player.
